title: Nikela e-Orbital Temple
heading: Qedela Umnikelo Wakho
chooseHow: Khetha ukuthi ungathanda ukuqedela kanjani umnikelo wakho odonswa intela:

option1.heading: Inketho 1: Nikela Ku-inthanethi Manje
option1.description: Qedela umnikelo wakho ngokushesha usebenzisa ikhadi lesikweletu, ikhadi ledebhithi, noma ezinye izindlela zokukhokha ku-inthanethi ngomxhasi wethu wezezimali ovikelekile, The Field . Uzothola irisidi yentela esheshayo.

option2.heading: Indlela yesi-2: Idiphozithi Yebhange ku-Roy Foundation
option2.description: Faka idiphozi eqondile yasebhange noma udlulisele imali ngezintambo ku- The Roy Foundation , uzakwethu wesu lethu kanye nomxhasi wezezimali. Le nketho ilungele iminikelo emikhulu noma ukudluliselwa kwamanye amazwe.
option2.instructions: Sicela ufake " i-Orbital Temple - {donationType} " endaweni yesithenjwa. Ngemva kokuqeda ukudlulisa kwakho, sithumele i-imeyili ku-sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art ngemininingwane yakho yokudlulisa ukuze uthole irisidi yakho yentela.

taxInfo.heading: Ukunikeza Okudonswa Kwentela
taxInfo.description: I-Orbital Temple iphrojekthi exhaswe ngezimali ye- The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , inhlangano engenzi nzuzo engu- 501(c)(3) . Yonke iminikelo yase-US idonswa intela ngokwezinga elivunyelwe umthetho.
